bill.title: Motor Carriers; conform code sections to reflect prior transfer of duties of the PSC to the Mississippi Transportation Commission.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Motor Carriers Laws To Reflect The Prior Transfer Of The Duties Of The Public Service Commission To The Mississippi Transportation Commission; To Amend Sections 77-7-7, 77-7-21, 77-7-23, 77-7-55, 77-7-115, 77-7-119, 77-7-125, 77-7-127, 77-7-333, 77-7-335, 77-7-337 And 77-7-339, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Conform; To Amend Sections 77-9-5, 77-9-119, 77-9-489 And 77-9-605, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Conform To The Prior Transfer Of The Duties Of The Public Service Commission Related To Railroads To The Mississippi Transportation Commission; And For Related Purposes.
